subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Wireless Communications
lead_paragraph: The former T-Mobile rider Patrik Sinkewitz said the German cycling federation knew he used the blood booster EPO early in his career. Sinkewitz, 27, is serving a one-year suspension after testing positive for elevated testosterone levels before the Tour de France in June.
